title: The Smashing Pumpkins - Leaked Netphoria Demos
description:
This is 9 song collection that was leaked through netphoria.org this summer featuring demos and alt takes from songs through the MCIS and Machina eras.

1. In The Arms of Sheep [Full]
2. In The Arms of Sheep [Alt]
3. Identify [BC Vox]
4. Home [Alt Version]
5. Raindrops and Sunshowers [Demo Version]
6. Glass and the Ghost Children [Acoustic Demo]
7. Envelope Woman
8. Where Boys Fear to Tread [Demo]
9. Without You


The new Smashing Pumpkins record, Monuments to an Elegy, is out later this year featuring Tommy Lee on drums. 

Their last record, Oceania, is available to purchase now. 

Support the band, support the music. 

Rock on.
